pageContext.claim: “I went through Congress. I made a deal. I got almost $1.4 billion when I wasn't supposed to get $1, not $1, he’s not going to get $1. Well, I got $1.4 billion, but I'm not happy with.”
pageContext.analysis: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi said she would not give one dollar for Trump's concrete border wall. That's still true: the spending bill that Trump signed restricts the $1.375 billion for a barrier to bollard fencing. The law lists areas along the border where such bollard fencing cannot be used and requiring mutual agreement with the locally elected officials in five cities and localities before any construction could start. Trump’s border-wall prototypes are still banned under the law.
